name: Copy of Enterprise Apps V2
description:
ContextOS is designed to make business, technical, and strategic documents:

* faster to create
* easier to maintain
* more consistent
* always up-to-date
* validated against standards

Users should **not** need to understand technical concepts like “knowledge graphs,” “atoms,” or “capsules.”
Their experience must feel as simple as:

> *“I need a document → I get a great first draft → I refine it → I check it → I finalize.”*

Behind the scenes, the system handles all of the complexity.
